channel.title: Posts on ZedSoft Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ZedSoft Blog

item.title: Needle in a Haystack
item.description: Valuable information is hard to come by compared to the amount of data we have access to. Generative AI will provide even more noise to the ever growing orchestra of the global internet. How can one combat this seemingly unavoidable wave of events that are leading up to a larger-than-ever haystack of data? One can certainly make a business riding these waves. New human written, high quality, cross validated and well labelled datasets which contain specialized information will be hard to come by and they will be essential for improving pre-trained models for specific use cases.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: I wanted to start blogging for a while and as a casual follower of the generative AI hype train the obvious decision was to mess around with GPT-4. Using this little tool is like finding a new coding superpower - super convinient for well defined tasks. So let’s see how this blog came to be… Prompt: “I would like to create a simple, self-deployed blog. I am familiar with flask and node.
